code: var calculateAverageValues=function calculateAverageValues(matrixData){var matrixValuesOnly=matrixData.map(function(item){return item.map(function(row){return row.value;});});var columnsNumber=matrixValuesOnly[0].length;var averageValues=[];for(var columnIndex=0;columnIndex<columnsNumber;columnIndex++){var columnSum=0;for(var rowIndex=0;rowIndex<matrixValuesOnly.length;rowIndex++){columnSum+=matrixValuesOnly[rowIndex][columnIndex];}var average=columnSum/matrixValuesOnly.length;averageValues.push(average);}return averageValues.map(function(avgValue){return avgValue.toFixed(2);});};export default calculateAverageValues;
